front.title: A Generic Autonomic Deployment and Management Mechanism for Resource-based Network Services

author.organization: Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications

abstract.t: This document specifies an autonomic mechanism for resource-based network services deployment and management, using the GeneRic Autonomic Signaling Protocol (GRASP) to dynamically exchange the information among the autonomic nodes. It supports the coordination and consistently operations within an autonomic network domain. This mechanism is generic for most, if not all, of kinds of network resources, although this document only defines the process of quality transmission service deployment and management. It can be easily extended to support network services deployment and management that is based on other types of network resources.
